22: הַיֹּשֵׁב֙ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>[It is] he that sitteth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>above</n> ח֣וּג <sup>2329 </sup> <n>upon the circle</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> וְיֹשְׁבֶ֖יהָ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and the inhabitants</n> כַּחֲגָבִ֑ים <sup>2284 </sup> <n>thereof [are] as grasshoppers</n> הַנּוֹטֶ֤ה <sup>5186 </sup> <n>that stretcheth out</n> כַדֹּק֙ <sup>1852 </sup> <n>as a curtain</n> שָׁמַ֔יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>the heavens</n> וַיִּמְתָּחֵ֥ם <sup>4969 </sup> <n>and spreadeth them out</n> כָּאֹ֖הֶל <sup>168 </sup> <n>as a tent</n> לָשָֽׁבֶת׃ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>to dwell in</n>
23: הַנּוֹתֵ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>That bringeth</n> רוֹזְנִ֖ים <sup>7336 </sup> <n>the princes</n> לְאָ֑יִן <sup>369 </sup> <n>to nothing</n> שֹׁ֥פְטֵי <sup>8199 </sup> <n>the judges</n> אֶ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> כַּתֹּ֥הוּ <sup>8414 </sup> <n>as vanity</n> עָשָֽׂה׃ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>to nothing he maketh</n>
24: אַ֣ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>yet</n> בַּל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>lest</n> נִטָּ֗עוּ <sup>5193 </sup> <n>Yea they shall not be planted</n> אַ֚ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>yet</n> בַּל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>lest</n> זֹרָ֔עוּ <sup>2232 </sup> <n>yea they shall not be sown</n> אַ֛ף <sup>637 </sup> <n>yet</n> בַּל־ <sup>1077 </sup> <n>lest</n> שֹׁרֵ֥שׁ <sup>8327 </sup> <n>shall not take root</n> בָּאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the earth</n> גִּזְעָ֑ם <sup>1503 </sup> <n>yea their stock</n> וְגַם־ <sup>1571 </sup> <n>merely</n> נָשַׁ֤ף <sup>5398 </sup> <n>and he shall also blow</n> בָּהֶם֙ וַיִּבָ֔שׁוּ <sup>3001 </sup> <n>upon them and they shall wither</n> וּסְעָרָ֖ה <sup>5591 </sup> <n>and the whirlwind</n> כַּקַּ֥שׁ <sup>7179 </sup> <n>them away as stubble</n> תִּשָּׂאֵֽם׃ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>shall take</n> ס
25: וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> מִ֥י <sup>4310 </sup> <n>whom</n> תְדַמְּי֖וּנִי <sup>1819 </sup> <n>To whom then will ye liken</n> וְאֶשְׁוֶ֑ה <sup>7737 </sup> <n>me or shall I be equal</n> יֹאמַ֖ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>? saith</n> קָדֽוֹשׁ׃ <sup>6918 </sup> <n>the Holy One</n>
26: שְׂאוּ־ <sup>5375 </sup> <n>Lift up</n> מָר֨וֹם <sup>4791 </sup> <n>on high</n> עֵינֵיכֶ֤ם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>your eyes</n> וּרְאוּ֙ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>and behold</n> מִי־ <sup>4310 </sup> <n>who</n> בָרָ֣א <sup>1254 </sup> <n>who hath created</n> אֵ֔לֶּה <sup>428 </sup> <n>these</n> הַמּוֹצִ֥יא <sup>3318 </sup> <n>these [things] that bringeth out</n> בְמִסְפָּ֖ר <sup>4557 </sup> <n>by number</n> צְבָאָ֑ם <sup>6635 </sup> <n>their host</n> לְכֻלָּם֙ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> בְּשֵׁ֣ם <sup>8034 </sup> <n>them all by names</n> יִקְרָ֔א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>he calleth</n> מֵרֹ֤ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>by the greatness</n> אוֹנִים֙ <sup>202 </sup> <n>of his might</n> וְאַמִּ֣יץ <sup>533 </sup> <n>for that [he is] strong</n> כֹּ֔חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>in power</n> אִ֖ישׁ <sup>376 </sup> <n>not one</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>before</n> נֶעְדָּֽר׃ <sup>5737 </sup> <n>faileth</n> ס
27: לָ֤מָּה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>Why</n> תֹאמַר֙ <sup>559 </sup> <n>Why sayest</n> יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>thou O Jacob</n> וּתְדַבֵּ֖ר <sup>1696 </sup> <n>and speakest</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>O Israel</n> נִסְתְּרָ֤ה <sup>5641 </sup> <n>is hid</n> דַרְכִּי֙ <sup>1870 </sup> <n>My way</n> מֵיְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>from the LORD</n> וּמֵאֱלֹהַ֖י <sup>430 </sup> <n>angels</n> מִשְׁפָּטִ֥י <sup>4941 </sup> <n>and my judgment</n> יַעֲבֽוֹר׃ <sup>5674 </sup> <n>is passed over</n>
28: הֲל֨וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יָדַ֜עְתָּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Hast thou not known</n> אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>lo</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> שָׁמַ֗עְתָּ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>? hast thou not heard</n> אֱלֹהֵ֨י <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> עוֹלָ֤ם ׀ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>[that] the everlasting</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> בּוֹרֵא֙ <sup>1254 </sup> <n>the Creator</n> קְצ֣וֹת <sup>7098 </sup> <n>of the ends</n> הָאָ֔רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>does not</n> יִיעַ֖ף <sup>3286 </sup> <n>fainteth</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>or</n> יִיגָ֑ע <sup>3021 </sup> <n>not neither is weary</n> אֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>no</n> חֵ֖קֶר <sup>2714 </sup> <n>? [there is] no searching</n> לִתְבוּנָתֽוֹ׃ <sup>8394 </sup> <n>of his understanding</n>
29: נֹתֵ֥ן <sup>5414 </sup> <n>He giveth</n> לַיָּעֵ֖ף <sup>3287 </sup> <n>to the faint</n> כֹּ֑חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>power</n> וּלְאֵ֥ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>lacks</n> אוֹנִ֖ים <sup>202 </sup> <n>and to [them that have] no might</n> עָצְמָ֥ה <sup>6109 </sup> <n>strength</n> יַרְבֶּֽה׃ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>he increaseth</n>
30: וְיִֽעֲפ֥וּ <sup>3286 </sup> <n>shall faint</n> נְעָרִ֖ים <sup>5288 </sup> <n>Even the youths</n> וְיִגָ֑עוּ <sup>3021 </sup> <n>and be weary</n> וּבַחוּרִ֖ים <sup>970 </sup> <n>and the young men</n> כָּשׁ֥וֹל <sup>3782 </sup> <n>shall utterly</n> יִכָּשֵֽׁלוּ׃ <sup>3782 </sup> <n>fall</n>
31: וְקוֹיֵ֤ <sup>6960 </sup> <n>But they that wait</n> יְהוָה֙ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>upon the LORD</n> יַחֲלִ֣יפוּ <sup>2498 </sup> <n>shall renew</n> כֹ֔חַ <sup>3581 </sup> <n>[their] strength</n> יַעֲל֥וּ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>they shall mount up</n> אֵ֖בֶר <sup>83 </sup> <n>with wings</n> כַּנְּשָׁרִ֑ים <sup>5404 </sup> <n>as eagles</n> יָר֙וּצוּ֙ <sup>7323 </sup> <n>they shall run</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and not</n> יִיגָ֔עוּ <sup>3021 </sup> <n>and not be weary</n> יֵלְכ֖וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>will walk</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and not</n> יִיעָֽפוּ׃ <sup>3286 </sup> <n>and not faint</n> פ
